sentence.Network_en: The builders have perched a light concrete dome on eight slender columns.
sentence.Network_cn: 建筑工人在8根细柱上架起轻巧的混凝土穹顶。

sentence.Network_en: Charlie was earning eight pounds, I was earning five.
sentence.Network_cn: 查利赚了8英镑，我赚了5英镑。

sentence.Network_en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentence.Network_cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

means.word_mean: 1. a playing card with eight pips on the face

auth_sentence.content: It will be attended by eight heads of state.
auth_sentence.res_content: It will be attended by eight heads of state.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It will be attended by eight heads of state.

auth_sentence.content: His shrine there receives eight million visitors a year.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: His shrine there receives eight million visitors a year.

auth_sentence.content: Leave to chill in the fridge for eight hours.
